name: github-dark-script
description: GitHub Dark in userscript form, with an options panel

scripts.update: npx updates -cu && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.patch: npm run test && npx ver -p patch github-dark-script.user.js
scripts.minor: npm run test && npx ver -p minor github-dark-script.user.js
scripts.major: npm run test && npx ver -p major github-dark-script.user.js
